test.name: CP01 - Registro de Usuarios

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://practice.expandtesting.com/notes/api/users/register path_url=/notes/api/users/register headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '90', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name : \\"Ana Mariasss\\" , email : \\"anamariasss@reqres.com\\",": "password : \\"pistol\\""}'

test.name: CP02 - Login de Usuario

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
